titleStmt.title: A bloody and cruel plot, intended by the popish army, and their adherents, against the Kings Majesty and all the Protestants of the Kingdome, to the murther and ruine of the English Protestants: discovered by a petition intercepted.
titleStmt.author: B. J. V. D.
G. L.

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
